name: Maze of Faith
description:
Wander through the halls to reach the fruits of your labor. No matter how many times you go through, you must keep going. Trust that something will happen eventually..... it has to, right? Because you've been so devoted this whole time.

This walking sim is my attempt to make a game that reflects my observations and experiences about religion and faith.

Developer and programmer: Hua Caparusso

Original Wall Model: https://free3d.com/3d-model/wall-56350.html (edited for game)

Marble texture: https://free-3dtextureshd.com/download/white-marble-pbr-textures-3d-free-downloa...

Skybox: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/allsky-free-10-s...

Original music: https://tunetank.com/track/5030-flying-in-the-clouds/ (edited for game)

Original bell noise: https://freesound.org/people/InspectorJ/sounds/415510/ (edited for game)
